title: Investing in Space: Rocket Lab stock leads the sector in year-to-date gains
summary: At the beginning of this year, I included a breakout space stock as one of the three things I’m watching for in 2023. Just past the halfway point we have strong contenders for that title, led by Rocket Lab and followed by Redwire and Mynaric, with the top five rounded out by Telesat and BlackSky.

title: Northrop Grumman planning Cygnus upgrades
summary: Northrop Grumman is planning upgrades to its Cygnus cargo vehicle, such as increased payload capacity, to support both the International Space Station and future commercial space stations.

title: Probing the origin and evolution of water-rich asteroids
summary: More than half the work of the Emirates Mission to the Asteroid Belt is expected to be performed by UAE companies.

title: Northrop Grumman Reassessing Government Fixed Price Contracts After Loss on HALO
summary: Northrop Grumman is reconsidering when to sign fixed price contracts with the government after experiencing a $36 million loss on NASA’s Habitation and Logistics Outpost. Company head Kathy Warden told […]

title: SpaceX set for launch of the Intelsat communications satellite
summary: SpaceX is set for a midnight launch to send a communications satellite to geostationary transfer orbit for Intelsat. The two-hour launch window...
